name: The Preacher

topics.response_text: And the sun will rise in the north! No! the northwest! For forty-four days and sixty-seven nights! And we'll never notice!{Insane ravings of a street preacher.}

description:
The Preacher is a 55 year-old Caucasian Male.

A middle-aged man with wild, unkempt hair and bloodshot eyes, standing on the second floor of a derelict building in Seward Square. He clutches his head intermittently while preaching about apocalyptic revelations.

The Preacher's Personality: Paranoid, delusional, obsessive, and prone to violent outbursts. Believes he has been chosen to deliver divine messages about the end times.

The Preacher's Backstory: Once a resident of the Capital Wasteland, The Preacher suffered a severe head injury during a raider attack years ago. The trauma triggered a psychological break, causing him to believe he had been chosen as a prophet to warn others of impending doom. He has since wandered the wasteland, gathering followers and preaching his twisted interpretation of scripture until his madness became too pronounced even for other wastelanders.
